long_description: ” Tracy Clement Apprenticeship Director Best Practice Network "We are now 6 months into using Bud and WOW. Our explainer provides a brief, but comprehensive overview of the Bud platform. Alternatively, if you'd like to learn about how the Bud platform could help to elevate your training delivery, book a discovery call , to speak to one of our experts.
